mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOOK(ID, USER_ID, HOTEL_ROOM_ID, PLEASE, CHECK_IN, CHECK_OUT, STATUS, ORDER_ID) VALUES(seq_book.nextval, #{userId}, #{roomId}, #{please}, #{checkIn}, #{checkOut}, #{status}, #{orderId})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.*, ROWNUM AS RNUM, COUNT(*) OVER () AS TOTCNT FROM ( SELECT B.ID, H.NAME AS HOTEL, B.COUNT, TO_CHAR(B.CHECK_IN, 'YYMMDD') AS CHECK_IN, TO_CHAR(B.CHECK_OUT, 'YYMMDD') AS CHECK_OUT, R.NAME ROOM, B.PLEASE FROM HOTEL H, BOOK B, ROOM R, ORDERS O WHERE H.ID = R.HOTEL_ID AND R.ID = B.HOTEL_ROOM_ID AND B.USER_ID = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND B.STATUS = #{status} AND B.ORDER_ID = O.ID ORDER BY B.CHECK_IN) A) WHERE RNUM >= #{viewPage} AND RNUM <= #{limit} ORDER BY ID

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT A.*, ROWNUM AS RNUM, COUNT(*) OVER () AS TOTCNT FROM ( SELECT B.ID, H.NAME AS HOTEL, B.COUNT, TO_CHAR(B.CHECK_IN, 'YYMMDD') AS CHECK_IN, TO_CHAR(B.CHECK_OUT, 'YYMMDD') AS CHECK_OUT, R.NAME ROOM, B.PLEASE FROM HOTEL H, BOOK B, ROOM R, ORDERS O WHERE H.ID = R.HOTEL_ID AND R.ID = B.HOTEL_ROOM_ID AND B.USER_ID = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND B.STATUS = #{status} AND B.ORDER_ID = O.ID ORDER BY B.CHECK_IN) A) WHERE RNUM >= #{viewPage} AND RNUM <= #{limit}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT A.*, ROWNUM AS RNUM, COUNT(*) OVER () AS TOTCNT FROM ( SELECT B.ID, U.USER_ID, H.NAME HOTEL, TO_CHAR(O.ORDER_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') ORDER_DATE, TO_CHAR(B.CHECK_IN, 'YYMMDD') AS CHECK_IN, TO_CHAR(B.CHECK_OUT, 'YYMMDD') AS CHECK_OUT, B.STATUS FROM BOOK B, HOTEL H, ORDERS O, USERS U, ROOM R WHERE R.ID = B.HOTEL_ROOM_ID AND U.ID = O.USER_ID AND U.ID = B.USER_ID AND H.ID = R.HOTEL_ID AND O.ID = B.ORDER_ID GROUP BY U.USER_ID, H.NAME, O.ORDER_DATE, B.STATUS, B.ID, B.CHECK_IN, B.CHECK_OUT ORDER BY B.ID DESC)A) WHERE RNUM >= #{viewPage} AND RNUM <= #{limit}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.*, ROWNUM AS RNUM, COUNT(*) OVER () AS TOTCNT FROM ( SELECT B.ID, U.USER_ID, H.NAME HOTEL, TO_CHAR(O.ORDER_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') ORDER_DATE, TO_CHAR(B.CHECK_IN, 'YYMMDD') AS CHECK_IN, TO_CHAR(B.CHECK_OUT, 'YYMMDD') AS CHECK_OUT, B.STATUS FROM BOOK B, HOTEL H, ORDERS O, USERS U, ROOM R WHERE R.ID = B.HOTEL_ROOM_ID AND U.ID = O.USER_ID AND U.ID = B.USER_ID AND H.ID = R.HOTEL_ID AND O.ID = B.ORDER_ID GROUP BY U.USER_ID, H.NAME, O.ORDER_DATE, B.STATUS, B.ID, B.CHECK_IN, B.CHECK_OUT ORDER BY B.ID DESC)A) WHERE RNUM >= #{viewPage} AND RNUM <= #{limit}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT A.*, ROWNUM AS RNUM, COUNT(*) OVER () AS TOTCNT FROM ( SELECT B.ID, R.NAME ROOM, U.NAME, B.COUNT, TO_CHAR(B.CHECK_IN, 'YYMMDD') AS CHECK_IN, TO_CHAR(B.CHECK_OUT, 'YYMMDD') AS CHECK_OUT, B.PLEASE FROM HOTEL H, BOOK B, ROOM R, USERS U WHERE B.HOTEL_ROOM_ID = R.ID AND B.USER_ID = U.ID AND H.USER_ID = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND B.STATUS = #{status} AND B.REMOVE_DATE IS NULL GROUP BY B.ID, R.NAME, U.NAME, B.COUNT, B.CHECK_IN, B.CHECK_OUT, B.PLEASE ORDER BY B.CHECK_IN)A) WHERE RNUM >= #{viewPage} AND RNUM <= #{limit}
